content: treble_crochet in the last 4 sts ch1 turn r13 - treble_crochet in the first 7 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x 9 treble_crochet in last 5 sts ch1 turn r14 -treble_crochet in the first 8 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x 7 treble_crochet in last 8 sts ch1 turn r15 -treble_crochet in the first 10 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x6 treble_crochet in last 8 sts ch1 turn r16 - treble_crochet in the first 10 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x5 treble_crochet in last 10 sts ch1 turn r17- treble_crochet in the first 13 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x3 treble_crochet in last 11 sts ch1 turn r18- treble_crochet in the first 13 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x2 treble_crochet in last 13 sts ch1 turn r19-treble_crochet in the first 15 sts ch1 sk1 treble_crochet x1 treble_crochet in last 13 sts ch1 turn r20-21- treble_crochet into all 30 sts ch1 turn at end of row 21 do not turn your work slip_stitch between the last two posts of the row you are now ready to edge your block edging your block ch1 double_crochet in the same space place another 40 double_crochet evenly down the side of your block 41 sts ch1 and double_crochet in same corner space as your last stitch make one double_crochet in each of the 30 sts across place your last double_crochet in the corner ch1 and double_crochet for the next side in the same stitch continue round the square in the same way to complete slip_stitch to the top of your first stitch or make an invisible join your block is now complete optional - i chose to go once around the square again in a contrast colour if doing that please join your yarn close to a bottom corner i suggest 6 stitches away and double_crochet around in corners please double_crochet ch2 double_crochet into the same stitch to get a nice pointy corner i d love to see your finished projects please tag me on instagram @crochetscot and add #crochetscot to your posts
